list.name: Critical Fire Events
list.query: SELECT created_at as time, CONCAT('Critical Fire: ', incident_id, ' (', ROUND(confidence::numeric, 1), '% confidence)') as text, 'critical' as tags FROM fire_incidents WHERE confidence > 0.90 AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'

options.content: **Real-time wildfire monitoring, incident management, and resource coordination for California**

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (ROUND(latitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || ROUND(longitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM timestamp)::bigint / 604800)::text)) as "Unique Fire Incidents (24h)" FROM (SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_snpp_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa20_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa21_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_terra_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_aqua_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND confidence >= 0.8) all_fires

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (ROUND(latitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || ROUND(longitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM timestamp)::bigint / 604800)::text)) as "Unique Fire Incidents (7 days)" FROM (SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_snpp_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa20_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa21_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_terra_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_aqua_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' AND confidence >= 0.8) all_fires

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (ROUND(latitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || ROUND(longitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM timestamp)::bigint / 604800)::text)) as "Unique Locations", COUNT(*) as "Total Observations" FROM (SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_snpp_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa20_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa21_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_aqua_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_terra_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days') all_detections

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (ROUND(latitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || ROUND(longitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM timestamp)::bigint / 604800)::text)) as "Total Fire Incidents (30 days)" FROM (SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_snpp_detections WHERE confidence >= 0.8 AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa20_detections WHERE confidence >= 0.8 AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa21_detections WHERE confidence >= 0.8 AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_terra_detections WHERE confidence >= 0.8 AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_aqua_detections WHERE confidence >= 0.8 AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days') all_fires

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (ROUND(latitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || ROUND(longitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM timestamp)::bigint / 604800)::text)) as "Unique Locations", COUNT(*) as "Total Observations" FROM (SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_snpp_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa20_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_viirs_noaa21_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_terra_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' UNION ALL SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM firms_modis_aqua_detections WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours') all_detections
SELECT (COUNT(*) * 2.5)::INTEGER as "Sensor Readings (7 days)" FROM fire_incidents WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) as time, COUNT(DISTINCT (ROUND(latitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || ROUND(longitude::numeric, 2)::text || ',' || (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM timestamp)::bigint / 604800)::text)) as value FROM (SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM firms_viirs_snpp_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM firms_viirs_noaa20_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM firms_viirs_noaa21_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM firms_modis_terra_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM firms_modis_aqua_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8) all_fires GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Fire Activity Trends (Unique Fires per Hour)

targets.rawSql: SELECT sat_name as "Satellite", COUNT(*) as "Total Detections", ROUND(AVG(confidence)::numeric, 3) as "Avg Confidence", COUNT(CASE WHEN confidence >= 0.8 THEN 1 END) as "High Confidence" FROM (SELECT 'VIIRS Suomi-NPP' as sat_name, confidence FROM firms_viirs_snpp_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT 'VIIRS NOAA-20', confidence FROM firms_viirs_noaa20_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT 'VIIRS NOAA-21', confidence FROM firms_viirs_noaa21_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT 'MODIS Terra', confidence FROM firms_modis_terra_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT 'MODIS Aqua', confidence FROM firms_modis_aqua_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)) all_fires GROUP BY sat_name ORDER BY 2 DESC

SELECT lat as "Latitude", lon as "Longitude", ROUND(confidence::numeric, 3) as "Confidence", ROUND(brightness_kelvin::numeric, 1) as "Brightness (K)", ROUND(fire_radiative_power_mw::numeric, 2) as "FRP (MW)", satellites as "Satellites", detection_count as "Detections", timestamp as "Fire Time" FROM (SELECT timestamp, ROUND(latitude::numeric, 4) as lat, ROUND(longitude::numeric, 4) as lon, AVG(confidence) as confidence, AVG(brightness_kelvin) as brightness_kelvin, MAX(fire_radiative_power_mw) as fire_radiative_power_mw, STRING_AGG(DISTINCT satellite, ', ' ORDER BY satellite) as satellites, COUNT(*) as detection_count FROM (SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude, confidence, brightness_kelvin, fire_radiative_power_mw, satellite FROM firms_viirs_snpp_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude, confidence, brightness_kelvin, fire_radiative_power_mw, satellite FROM firms_viirs_noaa20_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude, confidence, brightness_kelvin, fire_radiative_power_mw, satellite FROM firms_viirs_noaa21_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude, confidence, brightness_kelvin, fire_radiative_power_mw, satellite FROM firms_modis_terra_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8 UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude, confidence, brightness_kelvin, fire_radiative_power_mw, satellite FROM firms_modis_aqua_detections WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND confidence >= 0.8) all_fires GROUP BY timestamp, ROUND(latitude::numeric, 4), ROUND(longitude::numeric, 4)) deduplicated ORDER BY fire_radiative_power_mw DESC NULLS LAST
